# generated by cmake-generator
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)

add_library(nimble-client STATIC 
  client.c
  client_utils.c
  connect_response.c
  connection_quality.c
  debug.c
  download_state_part.c
  download_state_response.c
  game_state.c
  game_step_response.c
  incoming.c
  incoming_api.c
  join_game_participants_full.c
  join_game_response.c
  network_realizer.c
  outgoing.c
  pong.c
  prepare_header.c
  receive_transport.c
  send_steps.c)

include(Tornado.cmake)
set_tornado(nimble-client)

target_include_directories(nimble-client PUBLIC ../include)


target_link_libraries(nimble-client PUBLIC 
  nimble-serialize
  nimble-steps-serialize
  discoid
  stats
  datagram-transport
  blob-stream
  ordered-datagram
  secure-random
  lagometer)
